content: **get 20% off a purchase of 3 patterns with code 20off3** this is a fairly easy tapestry design that creates what looks like tiny hearts perfect for valentine s day **what you need to know ** * some knowledge of tapestry crochet may be helpful but this specific pattern will be nice for someone who has never worked up a tapestry project before * know how to work in the round * this pattern uses some simple stitch work * read through all of the pattern notes first before beginning * a photo tutorial is included in the pattern showing you how to create the tiny hearts * if you crochet pretty tight feel free to move up to a g 4 00mm hook **join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts ** https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet **follow me on instagram ** @simplyhookedbyjanet *this pattern has been fully tested to ensure accuracy* copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer > **subscribe** be one of the first to know when a new pattern is released and receive special discounts right to your inbox https //mailchi mp/4af338e8375b/simplyhookedbyjanet
